verse.name: c1
verse.lines: Tell the blessed story, of the cross of Jesus. newline Tell the blessed story, of the hallowed cross. newline Until every nation, learns of full salvation. newline Tell the blessed story of the cross.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Church of God awaken, heed the Lord's command. newline Tell the blessed story of the cross. newline Fields are white for harvesting, on ev'ry hand. newline Tell the blessed story of the cross.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Has He not commissioned you, the news to bear. newline Tell the blessed story of the cross. newline Go ye into all the world, and ev'rywhere newline Tell the blessed story of the cross.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Stand no longer idle, while the moments fly. newline Tell the blessed story of the cross. newline Multitudes in heathen darkness live and die. newline Tell the blessed story of the cross.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Publish unto all the world redeeming grace. newline Tell the blessed story of the cross. newline Until in the home of rest you find your place, newline Tell the blessed story of the cross.
